nodes.text: The Galactic Empire established a small Imperial outpost on the forest moon of Endor sometime after the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY. During the Galactic Civil War, it served as a temporary base of operations for Colonel Maximilian Veers.

Located south of the Smuggler Outpost, this diminutive Imperial outpost consisted of little more than a single watch tower, with a tall antennae and Imperial banner planted outside. Aside from Colonel Veers, it was also staffed by an Imperial recruiter, and a handful of Imperial troopers.

This Imperial outpost appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.

It was added for the Cries of Alderaan story arc in 2003 as one of five small Imperial outposts. Imperial players were sent to these locations during the second act to meet with an Imperial Commander who sent the player to a communications outpost to relay a message to Doctor Vacca. During the third act of the story arc, the players were once again randomly sent to one of the five locations to meet with Colonel Veers, who asked the player to attack a research facility.
